H0.text: A solute is brass, which is formed when zinc and copper are melted together.

H1.text: An element is brass, which is formed when zinc and copper are melted together.

H2.text: A mineral is brass, which is formed when zinc and copper are melted together.

H3.text: A mixture is brass, which is formed when zinc and copper are melted together.

A4.text: In the Middle East, people began alloying copper with zinc to form brass.
